comprehensive_overview: The fastai library simplifies training fast and accurate neural networks using modern best practices. It is built on top of PyTorch and provides many high-level abstractions to make it easy to train state-of-the-art models with little code.
core_features: 1. High-level API for training deep learning models. 2. Implements cutting-edge techniques in an accessible way. 3. Provides pre-trained models for transfer learning. 4. Includes tools for interpretability and visualization.
